title: The News with Rick Sanchez - October 25, 2019 (15:00 ET)
text:
More riots in Chile, APEC summit in peril (Full show)

Hundreds of thousands of Chileans are protesting worsening inequality in their country. The president has apologized but the riots remain unabated. Rick Sanchez reports. Then RT’s Donald Courter explains the details. Emperor Naruhito of Japan proclaimed his enthronement in a ceremony on Tuesday, surrounded by foreign royalty and dignitaries. "Boom Bust" co-host Christy Ai joins to discuss the value of tradition and even monarchy as a vehicle of national identity and foreign policy. A judge has overturned a Texas jury's decision to give full custody of 7-year-old James Younger to his mother, who seeks gender reassignment for her child, against the wishes of his father. Russian gun rights activist Maria Butina, arrested in July 2018 and sentenced to 18 months in prison for unregistered foreign lobbying, was released on Friday. Plus, RT America’s Steve Christakos joins to debut “Jock Talk,” a new Friday sports segment on the News with Rick Sanchez.
description:
More riots in Chile, APEC summit in peril (Full show)
Hundreds of thousands of Chileans are protesting worsening inequality in their country
